Package fr.umlv.card

Class Card

java.lang.Object
fr.umlv.card.Card
public final class Card
extends java.lang.Object
Author:
mohamed class that defines the actions on the object Card such as its value, color in case of graphic mode its coordinates, the length and width

      public Card​(int value, CardColor color, Coordinates coordinates)
      Constructs the object Card using card value, card Color, and the coordinates of the card
      Parameters:
      value - Integer value of the card
      color - Color color of the card
      coordinates - Coordinates of the card in graphic mode, can be null in console mode
